title: Bohdan Sarnavskyi
text:
Bohdan Ihorovych Sarnavskyi (; born 29 January 1995) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> Ukrainian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Kryvbas%20Kryvyi%20Rih%20%282020%29">Kryvbas Kryvyi Rih</a> on loan from <a href="SC%20Dnipro-1">Dnipro-1</a>.
Career.
Sarnavskyi is product of <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Kyiv">FC Dynamo Kyiv</a> and <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Kyiv">FC Arsenal Kyiv</a>.
He made his debut for FC Arsenal entering as a main squad player in game against <a href="FC%20Dnipro%20Dnipropetrovsk">FC Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk</a> on 2 March 2013 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
